keyword: how many calories in drumstick chicken
title: How Many Calories in a Chicken Drumstick?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in drumstick chicken, including protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition per drumstick for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in a Chicken Drumstick?
assumptions: Roasted chicken drumstick with skin, bone-in, average size (~75g edible portion), no added sauces or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by chicken size, cooking method, skin inclusion, and brand; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One roasted chicken drumstick provides ~172 kcal and ~24 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one drumstick chicken?
faqs.a: About 172 kcal for one roasted drumstick with skin.

faqs.q: How much protein in a chicken drumstick?
Are chicken drumsticks high in fat?
faqs.a: About 8 g total fat, including 2.2 g saturated, mostly from the skin.
Around 122 kcal, lower due to fat removal from skin.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in drumstick chicken?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”roasted is lower; frying adds ~100 kcal from oil absorption.
